mapper.sql: id, name, permission, url, c_urls, icon, type, level, parent_id, seq, is_use, description, create_time, update_time, rank
mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission (id, name, permission, url, c_urls, icon, type, level, parent_id, seq, is_use, description, create_time, update_time, rank) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isUse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into sys_permission
id,
name,
permission,
url,
c_urls,
icon,
type,
level,
parent_id,
seq,
is_use,
description,
create_time,
update_time,
rank,

mapper.update:
update sys_permission
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_urls = #{cUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_permission set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_urls = #{cUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p.* from sys_permission p , sys_role_permission rp WHERE p.id = rp.permission_id AND rp.role_id = #{roleId} order by p.level ASC,p.seq ASC
